__e: This certification was granted to us following an evaluation of our installations according to accessibility criteria for people with reduced mobility and their experience during their stay at Camping Aventure Mégantic.
« We inform you that our hotel is accessible to disabled people and one of our rooms have been studied for their hospitality. »
Most of our rooms are accessible by people with reduced mobility.

Access for people with reduced mobility is only possible in our restaurant and not in the hotel
A room for people with reduced mobility is available. In order to better meet your needs, please contact us on +33 (0) 1 47 70 10 84.
